cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)

exm.mng: watchman's clapper, wooden clappers with bars of unequal length
a general term for local operas in Shangxi, Henan, Hebei, Shandong etc, the music of such operas
variant of 硬邦邦[ying4 bang1 bang1]
